Articles.Content:
So just wanted to share that I finally managed to get a space plane(SSTO) up and docked with my main ship, couple pictures are here:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=156792270

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=156792251

Feel free to comment and if you have any suggestions for better designs let me know, I was able to hit 24,000m on the jet engines and rest was done under rocket power.
